title: Неукротимая Неупокоева
overview: Zoya Neupokoeva is successful, assertive, and self—confident. One day, she makes an offer to her boss, a successful lawyer Roman. But in the end, she remains without a beloved man, and without a job. And soon trouble comes to her family — Zoya's tribesmen disappear without a trace. Trying to figure out this complicated case, she turns for help to investigator Denis, whom she once intended to marry, but fled to Moscow to make a career as an investigator. And now Zoya realizes that she made a big mistake in her youth.
